page.title: 19Education
page.content: At Christmas there is a full production of such plays as 'A Christmas Carol,''Toad Of Toad Hall' and 'Alice In Wonderland.'There is no stage ,so stage blocks provide different levels for a theatre-in- the-round. At these times, and at other parts of the year, contact is made with the various senior citizens' homes in the town. The children entertain them with plays and Carol Concerts and the produce from Harvest Festival is taken to the Cottage hospital. The children raise money for various charities and correspond with people in Africa and India.
